Package com.server.pak.services

Class ReaderMessages

java.lang.Object
com.server.pak.services.ReaderMessages
public class ReaderMessages extends Object
A class that defines methods for reading messages and processing them, depending on their types.
See Also:
Message, ServerApp

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReaderMessages​(ServerApp server)
    The reader's constructor stores a link to the server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    auth​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
    Performs user authorization by checking the database, as well as the current session on the server.
    void
    changeName​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
    Changes the name of the client, saving the changes in the Database, the Name of the listener on the server and notifying all listeners of the server about the changes.
    void
    end​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
    Unsubscribes the listener from the subscription from the server, sends a message to all listeners about leaving the client's network.
    void
    personal​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
    Sends a personal message.
    boolean
    read​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
    Receives a message and passes it for processing, depending on the type of message.
    boolean
    regUser​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
    Registers a client listener on the server, sends a message to all listeners about connecting a new user, and sends an updated list of server users to all clients.
    void
    status​(Message message)
    Makes a mass mailing about a change in the user's status.
    void
    uMessage​(Message message)
    Makes a mass mailing.

  • Method Details

    • read

      public boolean read​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Receives a message and passes it for processing, depending on the type of message.
      Parameters:
      message - Message.
      clientHandler - The listener.
      Returns:
      True, but it is also possible to be false if you need to exit the authorization cycle.

    • auth

      public boolean auth​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Performs user authorization by checking the database, as well as the current session on the server.
      Parameters:
      message - Message.
      clientHandler - The listener.
      Returns:
      true if authorization is successful.

    • regUser

      public boolean regUser​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Registers a client listener on the server, sends a message to all listeners about connecting a new user, and sends an updated list of server users to all clients.
      Parameters:
      message - Message.
      clientHandler - The listener.
      Returns:
      false if the user's registration failed in the registration service.

    • end

      public void end​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Unsubscribes the listener from the subscription from the server, sends a message to all listeners about leaving the client's network.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - The listener.

    • changeName

      public void changeName​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Changes the name of the client, saving the changes in the Database, the Name of the listener on the server and notifying all listeners of the server about the changes.
      Parameters:
      message - Message.
      clientHandler - The listener.

    • personal

      public void personal​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Sends a personal message.
      Parameters:
      message - Message.
      clientHandler - The listener.

    • uMessage

      public void uMessage​(Message message)
      Makes a mass mailing.
      Parameters:
      message - Message.

    • status

      public void status​(Message message)
      Makes a mass mailing about a change in the user's status.
      Parameters:
      message - Message.
